subject: Order #SSN5354 Delivery
description_text:
Hi,

I made an order (#SSN5354) that was confirmed on the 26th of December with
an expected date of 31st December.
I have checked the UPS tracking and it seems like they haven't received the
package yet. I just want to check everything is fine with the order.
I'm expecting to be away from home on the 6th January so I may need to
rearrange delivery if It hasn't arrived by then.

Thanks,
Greg

conversations.body_text: Please can I have an update. Has the order been dispatched?  The tracking label still says its waiting for the package to be received.
Hi Gregory Sadler,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Your package has been shipped.  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510412550305/trackdetails
